name: Rocket Horizon
description:
You are invited to be a rocket pilot and test your skills by dodging obstacles. We will challenge you with fun courses on different planets.Are you ready?

Main features:

  • 30 unique and challenging levels.
  • Earth, Moon, Mars, and Space as beautiful scenarios.
  • 3 different tiny rockets that you control as you progress.

And more secrets that you need to play to discover them!
